plot: Noa tries to take care of her trauma struck friend, attempting to cure and bring him back to normal life while hiding from him her personal instinctive wishes.
title: Noa
plot_es: Noa tries to take care of her trauma struck friend, attempting to cure and bring him back to normal life while hiding from him her personal instinctive wishes.
plot_en: Noa tries to take care of her trauma struck friend, attempting to cure and bring him back to normal life while hiding from him her personal instinctive wishes.
